thread.section_title: Greatmats Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Greatmats | www.greatmats.com
thread.title: Accounts Payable/Lynn Vasconcellos
thread.title_full: Greatmats reviewed by Accounts Payable/Lynn Vasconcellos

author: Accounts Payable/Lynn Vasconcellos
title: Accounts Payable/Lynn Vasconcellos
text:
Excellent service. Quick and efficient. Great Mats found a way to make it happen for our students. They shipped out our middle school wrestling mats all the way to Hawaii, Waimanalo, Oahu.
Our middle schoolers have been able to practice since we got our new mats and are currently preparing for our first wrestling tournament in 2 weeks.
Thank you Great Mats for the awesome, professional, service!
- Douglas Hiu (Waimanalo middle school teacher and head wrestling coach)
